title: Helpes to humiliation
author: Bolton, Robert, 1572-1631.
publisher: By T. Cotes, for Peter Whaly, dwelling in North-Hampton,
notes: "Collected from that graue, learned, and godly diuine, Mr. Robert Bolton"--Dedication signed I.S.
Errors in paging: p. 109 and 134 misnumbered 119 and 138 respectively.
